caption.p: Schematic of the entry cells and tissues, dissemination, and shedding process of CDV in infected dogs. ( a) CDV infects macrophages or dendritic cells of the respiratory epithelium by binding with SLAM; ( b) immune cells of the lymph nodes are infected and then the CDV disseminates to the spleen, thymus, etc.; ( c) CDV further infects epithelial tissues by binding to the receptor nectin-4 of epithelial cells of the basolateral surface; ( d) CDV is released from the apical surface of epithelial cells.
